name: JuicySnake
description:
Welcome to JuicySnake! This is a casual game inspired by the classic snake game, but with special attention to game feel. If you're looking for an addictive and exciting experience, this game is for you!

In JuicySnake, your goal is to eat as many spheres as possible before time runs out. Every time you eat a sphere, your snake will become longer and it will be harder to avoid your own tail.

Unlike the classic snake game, JuicySnake has a musical focus that will make you move your body while you play. Every sphere you eat will trigger a musical note that creates a unique melody. Create your own song while you play!

This game has a duration of 3 minutes and is based on surpassing the best score you have obtained. There is no leaderboard (for now), only you can surpass you!

JuicySnake is available on Android, PC, MacOs, and WebGL. Play anytime, anywhere!

Are you ready for an exciting and musical adventure in just three minutes? Download JuicySnake now and show off your skills!
